data.system_settings: iPhone 6s with iOS 11.2.1 & iPad Air 2 with iOS 11.2.5 Public Beta
data.expected_result: Mention/channel link should be formatted with Markdown.
data.short_description: Markdown for mentions and channel links not shown
data.steps_to_repro: - Mention a user/role or link to a channel - Use Markdown for this mention/link like italics, underlined, etc. (everything besides bold should work) - Observe it and compare it with the Desktop version
